messages.content: Hey team, how’s progress on the new web app? Any blockers?
The React implementation is mostly done, but we’re facing some performance issues with the API.
Let me follow up with Bob’s team to prioritize the API fixes.
I’m finalizing the UI designs. Do we have any updates on the animations from Pixel Perfect?
Nala, let’s keep it simple for the beta. We can add the animations post-launch.
I’m working on optimizing the legacy system for SLA calculations. Should have an update by EOD.
Thanks, Bob! This will help a lot with the ticket submission speed.
Bob, let us know if you need additional resources from our team.
We’re ready to start the app migration to Kubernetes. Jane, can your team containerize the app?
Mark, we’re focusing on the beta launch first. Can this wait until post-launch?
We can help with some guidance or tooling if needed. Let us know what works.
If it’s not critical for the launch, let’s prioritize it afterward.
Understood. Let’s sync after the beta launch to schedule this.
We should finalize the features for the beta launch. Can we meet tomorrow?
Yes, I’ll prepare a draft of the UI updates for the meeting.
I’ll focus on fixing the high-priority API issues before the beta launch.
Great! Let’s aim to have everything ready by the end of the week.
Marketing needs an update on the beta launch timeline. When can we share it with the PR team?
We’re targeting a 2-week delay for the beta. I’ll confirm with Ana and Luka.
Karl, we’ll have a finalized timeline by the end of this week.
